title: Pull Social Media Data from FAMA
custom_steps:
* We will now be pulling social media data from FAMA instead of ViralNation
* There will no longer be a â€œSafety Scoreâ€� anymore

Some additional changes requested by AJ:

for Professional Players:

* Club users should only see the â€˜create reports for all playersâ€™ button
* BOC should see the â€˜create reports for all playersâ€™ button only when they have selected a single org
* BOC should see the â€˜create reports for 1st yearâ€™ button only when all orgs is selected
* The widget should display all players with an approved first year MNC who are showing on the clubs roster
** NOTE: It will continue display anyone with a report that the club can see, even if they are no longer - that remains unchanged
* 1st year players are players with an MNC start year >= current year - 1
* Added a 1st year filter to simplify finding the full list of 1st year players

For domestic players:

* No changes on the club side
* BOC should only see the â€˜create reports for all playersâ€™ if a single org is selected
* BOC should only see the two create reports for top players buttons if all orgs is selected
* Prior to the draft date, the widget should show all players who are available to be selected, with their origin linked to the submitting origin.  (this is the current functionality at ALL times)
* After the draft and before the signing deadline the widget should display only drafted players and they should be linked to the org who drafted them.  
* After the signing deadline the widget reverts to showing the available players for the next years draft (signed players will have moved into the professional side of this widget and should continue to show any reports they currently have)

* The MN Summary page layout will match the attached wireframe
* On the MN Summary page, the counts of pending transactions will be displayed underneath the team roster counts:
** Pending Dom. Transactions:
*** The count should be for any Submitted domestic transaction awaiting BOC approval or Pending to a Club
*** The count will link to Advanced Search filtered on:
**** Transactions
***** Transaction Status â†’ Is â†’ Pending to Club, Submitted to BOC
***** Club â†’ Is â†’ [the domestic mn clubs for the selected Org]
***** Date â†’ On or After â†’ [a month ago]
***** Transaction Type â†’ Is Not â†’ Winter League Request, IL Recertification
** Pending DSL Transactions
*** The count should be for any Submitted DSL transaction awaiting BOC approval or Pending to a Club for the selected Org
*** The count will link to Advanced Search filtered on:
**** Transactions
***** Transaction Status â†’ Is â†’ Pending to Club, Submitted to BOC
***** Club â†’ Is â†’ [the DSL clubs for the selected Org]
***** Date â†’ On or After â†’ [a month ago]
***** Transaction Type â†’ Is Not â†’ Winter League Request, IL Recertification
* The count will be displayed to the left of each respective category

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to View Club Roster Counts from the MN Summary Screen
custom_steps:
AC:

* The MN Summary page layout will match the attached wireframe
* Every MJ Org will be represented on the screen with respective boxes (similar to MJ Summary screen)
** Within these boxes will display the minor league affiliates of the organization
* The Domestic Reserve List counts will be displayed at the top of the table, to the right of the Org name
** When the count is over the limit (175), the number will display in red
* The roster counts for each individual mn team will be displayed
** The table will be split between the domestic mn teams and the dsl teams
** The table will be split between â€œActiveâ€� and â€œReserveâ€� counts
** When the count is over the limit, the number will display in red

title: As a BOC Admin, I don't want Clubs to be able to Option Players to an Out of Season Affiliate
custom_steps:
AC:

* On submit of an optional assignment, the system will perform a rule check to see if the To Club is in season
* If the affiliate season has ended, the system will return a blocking message for Club users and an overridable warning for BOC
** Title:
*** Error/Warning
** Body:
*** A Player may only be optioned to an affiliate club during that clubâ€™s season.
** Buttons: 
*** Back (for Clubs)
*** Ignore & Continue (for BOC)
*** Cancel (for BOC)
* If all of the organization's affiliates of have ended their season's, the player may only be optioned to the Complex League
** There is currently a rule that states â€œ"A Player may only be optioned to a rookie club during that clubâ€™s season."â€œ  This rule should be updated to: "A Player may only be optioned to a rookie club during that club's season, or if all other affiliates' seasons have ended."

title: Prevent BData from receiving picks on API during Prod mocks
custom_steps:
There are times when we want to run a mock draft in Production after the BData team has turned their listener on, so we donâ€™t want them to see picks on the API, but we/BOC do want to see the picks.  BDataâ€™s user account is in the â€œUnassignedâ€� org but this org still sees all Production picks on the API, whether in mock mode or not.  We need to decide how we want to address this.

We will add a new RULE4-MOCK-API-VIEWER permission which will be checked for all picks going out when a mock is running.  Permission will not be a part of any role and will need to be manually added to anyone who needs it (and will not be granted to anyone to start)
